name: Food Security Program
description: Programs include: - CalFresh Application Assistance - Bounty Box Deliveries - Every Sunday, clinic volunteers hand-deliver free bounty boxes straight to our patients’ doorsteps. - Food Pharmacy - Clinic by the Bay’s Food Pharmacy is a comprehensive, clinically-based food program that promotes and enables nutritious eating for patients with chronic conditions. Patients will receive a box of fresh produce every Saturday in front of the Clinic, along with nutrition and health education - Food Vouch
fullDescription: Programs include: - CalFresh Application Assistance - Bounty Box Deliveries - Every Sunday, clinic volunteers hand-deliver free bounty boxes straight to our patients’ doorsteps. - Food Pharmacy - Clinic by the Bay’s Food Pharmacy is a comprehensive, clinically-based food program that promotes and enables nutritious eating for patients with chronic conditions. Patients will receive a box of fresh produce every Saturday in front of the Clinic, along with nutrition and health education - Food Vouch
whatTheyOffer: Programs include: - CalFresh Application Assistance - Bounty Box Deliveries - Every Sunday, clinic volunteers hand-deliver free bounty boxes straight to our patients’ doorsteps. - Food Pharmacy - Clinic by the Bay’s Food Pharmacy is a comprehensive, clinically-based food program that promotes and enables nutritious eating for patients with chronic conditions. Patients will receive a box of fresh produce every Saturday in front of the Clinic, along with nutrition and health education - Food Vouch
howToGetIt: If you are interested in any of the programs listed & are a patient of the Clinic, please call the Clinic at (415) 405-0222 to hear more. Must be a patient of the clinic.
